lines.text: [plays organ music in church]
Jesus can see everything I do... and he's going to beat me brainless!
Come down.
[Scene change; they are in a factory]
think God out of existence; take responsibility for who you are.
Christ, kid, you're a weirdo.
Well, if that's all there is... we're stuffed.
Pop get pizza for cat!
And if the poison doens't get you... God will.
Bubby being left to die... me Pop now!
[approaching buxom Angel for the first time]
You're a sexy woman. God, you've got great tits. Great big whoppers, if you can say.
[after nurse Angel lets Buddy see her huge breasts while she gives him a shower]
They be beautiful... like mom.
You don't think they're too big?
They make perfection.
I think Angel is beautiful.
She's a fat slut.
Watch what you say, dear.
Better be known that she's a fat slut.
If God had wanted us to be fat, he'd just made us all the same way, wouldn't he? But he didn't! God doesn't like fat people! Fat people are an abomination in his eyes!
Me be pop now.
